txt.en: Arriving at the last known location of the Wose, Rhûd-pulo-Drât, you spot footprints
The tracks meander slowly, moving deeper into the woods
Defeat the strange creatures that scared off the Wose you found.
You find Rhûd-pulo-Drât, unharmed, but he runs off before you get a chance to speak with him
The last place the missing Wose was seen was in the Drúadan Forest.\n\nYou should search for the missing Wose.
Ghân-buri-Ghân can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should speak with Ghân-buri-Ghân.
You should follow the footprints and continue searching for the missing Wose.
There is an ancient darkness emanating from this mysterious foe

You describe to Ghân-buri-Ghân the strange creature that frightened Rhûd-pulo-Drât and attacked you.\n\n'You describe Dheghûn. They not from Drúadan Forest. Recently come here from unknown around same time Wood-troll turn to shadow. Dheghûn now threat too when they attack you and Rhûd-pulo-Drât. Must keep balance, yet so many pushing rocks.'
Ghân-buri-Ghân, chieftain of the Drúedain, asks of you to find Rhûd-pulo-Drât, a Wose who has recently gone missing.

'Tears of rain, yet another Drúadan missing. First Bhai-buri-Ghân, who die by foul, cursed Orc. Now Rhûd-pulo-Drât. You help find Rhûd-pulo-Drât. He know much of Drúedain beliefs and ancient rituals.'
